content:
ID-2-of-3 (Murphy & Pazzani, 1991)

  • Extends ID3 with m-of-n tests

    • 2-of-3(Age < 15, Tears=Normal, Astigmatic=Yes)






  • Learning m-of-n tests


    • I Initial state: 1-of-1(A=V) with highest information-gain
    • O Operators
      • Add new test, increment m and n 2-of-2(A=V, B=X)
      • Add new test, increment n 1-of-2(A=V, B=X)
    • E information-gain (Quinlan, 1984)
